entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Kincardine
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:49 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Goderich 12:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: -3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -5.7°C
Wind: S 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:58 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:58 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:58 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
